alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Loving; Reeves County Plains; Terrell; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 2:08PM CST until January 16 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 11 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From 8 PM CST /7 PM MST/ this evening to 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors, make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
